=How to install Ocsigen?=

=== The simplest and safest way: [[http://opam.ocamlpro.com/|opam]]

Just install opam and do: {{{opam install eliom}}}.
* [[site:install|Install with opam]]

=== Non-OCaml dependencies

You may need to install some external (i.e. non-OCaml) dependencies first. You can use [[https://opam.ocaml.org/packages/opam-depext/|ocaml-depext]] to install those packages on your operating system:

<<code language="sh"|
$ opam install ocaml-depext
$ opam depext ocsigen-start
>>
